text.author: Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia
text.title: Otto Jespersen
text.summary: Otto Jespersen was an early 20th Century Danish linguist teaching in Copenhagen, who specialized in the grammar of the English language and authored several influential books such as “Language: Its Nature, Development and Origin” (1922).
text.summary2: Otto Jespersen was a Danish linguist active between the late 19th and early 20th centuries, who focused on the grammar of the English language, and is best known for his work on syntax and language development, including his theories of the Rank and Nexus and his book “Language: Its Nature, Development and Origin”.
